attributes.background: The UK is the ONLY place in the world where hundreds of parents flee the country every year to avoid having their babies and young children taken from them by the State for forced adoption. Every single day dozens of babies are taken at birth following a prediction of future risk by social workers

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/104564

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
